title: Part 600 - Appeals
content:
Part 600 - Appeals

State Regulations
§ 600.1 - General provisions and definitions
§ 600.2 - Motions generally; special proceedings; calendars; submission
§ 600.3 - Initial filings; active management of causes; settlement or mediation program
§ 600.4 - Motions
§ 600.5 - Alternative methods of prosecuting appeal; time to file record, appendix or agreed statement
§ 600.6 - Appeals from Family Court
§ 600.7 - Action on submitted facts; transferred causes
§ 600.8 - Appeals in criminal cases
§ 600.9 - Time, number and manner of filing of records, appendices and briefs
§ 600.10 - Format and content of records, appendices and briefs
§ 600.11 - Additional rules relating to criminal appeals
§ 600.12 - Preference; dismissal of appeal or cause; dismissal calendar calls
§ 600.13 - Costs
§ 600.14 - Motions for reargument or leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals
§ 600.15 - Fees of the clerk of the court
§ 600.16 - Appeal from an order concerning a grand jury report; appeal from a judgment predicated upon the entry of a plea of guilty
§ 600.17 - Fees of the clerk of the court
§ 600.18 - Habeas corpus appeals
§ 600.19 - Appeals from award of compensation as to judicial appointees

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
